meta.name: description
meta.content: All students who enter the doors of Fort Sage Unified School District will learn the Essential Skills, Knowledge, and Behaviors to succeed in the next grade level and will graduate college and career ready!

div.p: Fort Sage Unified School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations.
